Key Match Events: Mickey Moniak hit a three-run homer.
Taylor Ward homered in his third straight game.
Rookie Niko Kavadas hit his second major league homer.
Andy Pages drove in his first run in nearly three weeks.
Ward, Jo Adell, and Zach Neto added RBI singles for the Angels in the eighth.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Roberts expressed disappointment in Bobby Miller's performance.
Manager Ron Washington praised Griffin Canning's performance.
Washington expressed a desire for the team to continue swinging the bats well for the rest of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angel Stadium was sold out for the second straight night, giving the Halos five sellouts this season.
Others: The Dodgers pulled Mookie Betts, Freddie Freeman, Teoscar Hernández, and Miguel Rojas in the late innings for rest.
Yoshinobu Yamamoto will return to the Dodgers' rotation after missing nearly three months with a right arm injury.
Angels' first-round pick Christian Moore has a torn meniscus in his left knee and may return to play for Double-A Rocket City this season.
